system.description: Elves are graceful fae beings with an innate connection to magic. Their keen senses and natural attunement to the arcane make them exceptional spellcasters and perceptive scouts.

traits.name: Ascendancy
traits.description: You are Trained in one Skill of your choice.

traits.name: Elven Eyes
traits.description: You gain Favor on sight-based Detect checks.

traits.name: Naturally Attuned
traits.description: You know one Spell of your choice (even if you are not a caster).
